title: rear_farm_area_incomplete_fence_resource_constraint
description: This record documents the rear area of MaMeeFarm where fencing remains incomplete due to limited available resources. Work activities continue despite temporary suspension of fence completion. This data unit is recorded for spatial and operational analysis purposes.
